Hero.animatedText: Transforming Concepts into Seamless User Experiences
Hero.greeting: Hi, I'm Bartosz, a Fullstack Developer based in Poland

first.title: I prioritize client collaboration, fostering open communication

second.title: I'm very flexible with time zone communications

fourth.title: Tech enthusiast with a passion for development.

fifth.title: Currently building a real time chat application.

sixth.title: Do you want to start a project together?

project1.title: DevOverflow
project1.des: Social media app for developers to help each others with problems.

project2.title: Podzian Coin
project2.des: Stablecoin pegged to USD on Ethereum blockchain.

experience1.title: Computer Science Student
experience1.desc: Currently studying computer science at the Technical University of Lodz, gaining a solid foundation in programming, algorithms and software engineering principles.

experience2.title: Online Courses Enthusiast
experience2.desc: Completed numerous online courses on platforms such as Coursera, Udemy, and edX.

approach1.title: Planning & Strategy
approach1.des: We'll collaborate to map out your website's goals, target audience, and key functionalities. We'll discuss things like site structure, navigation, and content requirements.
approach1.heading: Phase 1

approach2.title: Development & Progress Update
approach2.des: Once we agree on the plan, I cue my lofi playlist and dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.
approach2.heading: Phase 2

approach3.title: Development & Launch
approach3.des: This is where the magic happens! Based on the approved design,  I'll translate everything into functional code, building your website from the ground up.
approach3.heading: Phase 3

Footer.title2: digital presence to the next level?
Footer.cta: Reach out to me today and let's discuss how can help you achieve your goals.
